org.teatrove.teatools
Class TeaCompiler

java.lang.Object
  org.teatrove.tea.compiler.Compiler
      org.teatrove.tea.util.AbstractFileCompiler
          org.teatrove.tea.util.FileCompiler
              org.teatrove.teatools.TeaCompiler
Direct Known Subclasses:
TextCompiler
public class TeaCompiler
extends FileCompiler

Simple extension of the Tea FileCompiler that allows a context class to be specified by name. In addition the TeaCompiler acts as a factory for producing various Tea compiler components.

Author:
Mark Masse

Field Detail

mRuntimeContextClass

protected Class mRuntimeContextClass
The Runtime Context Class

mScannerErrorListener

protected ErrorListener mScannerErrorListener
The ErrorListener for Scanner errors. These errors are in the category of syntax errors.

mParserErrorListener

protected ErrorListener mParserErrorListener
The ErrorListener for Parser errors. These errors are in the category of syntax errors.

mTypeCheckerErrorListener

protected ErrorListener mTypeCheckerErrorListener
The ErrorListener for TypeChecker errors. These errors are in the category of semantic errors. A common cause of a semantic error is a type misuse.
